title: From Kyrie's White Boat to Jesse Williams' Black Vote
itunes:title: From Kyrie's White Boat to Jesse Williams' Black Vote
description:
MON 6/27 - Kyrie Irving got the party started this weekend and rattled "black twitter" with his All-Becky Boat Party! Then Jesse Williams black-ed out on the BET Awards with his millennial-moving revolutionary speech. Adopted BET star Justin Timberlake tried to be inspired...but he had a better chance on Kyrie's boat. Let's discuss it all.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
